en-US.summary: Retrieve the latest info on Stellar Lumens from coinmarketcap.com.
examplePhrases: Alexa what is the lumen price?
en-US.name: Lumen Price
en-US.description:
Ask for the current Lumen Price, and retrieve the latest info from coinmarketcap.com.

Lumen price will keep you uptodate about your favorite cryptocurrency Stellar Lumens.

To start, just say "Alexa, start Lumen Price" or "Alexa, open Lumen Price" to get the current price".

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
